scripts.service:start: npm run migration:install && pm2 start ./main.js --name athajaya --node-args "--env-file=./.env"
scripts.service:restart: npm run service:stop && npm run service:start
scripts.service:uninstall: npm run service:stop && pm2 delete athajaya && pm2 save
scripts.test:suite: npm run test:migration:rollback && npm run test:migration:install && node --env-file=.env.test ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha ./test/test.js
